info.title: Indian Railways
info.description: Get station codes and also get PNR status of indian railways using this easy API, this is developed for educational purposes only and we are not affiliated to indian railways in any form and this is not an official api also.

get.description: Get station codes from the station name.

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Name of the station for which station codes to be pulled.

get.description: Just give 10-digit pnr number and get the status.

parameters.name: pnr
parameters.description: PNR number for which query need to be carried out.
